code: import React from'react';import{NavLink,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/Sidebar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const navItems=[{path:'/',label:'Dashboard'},{path:'/owners',label:'Owners'},{path:'/restaurants',label:'Restaurants'},{path:'/customers',label:'Customers'},{path:'/bookings',label:'Bookings'},{path:'/analytics',label:'Analytics'},{path:'/settings',label:'Settings'}];function Sidebar(){const navigate=useNavigate();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("aside",{className:"sidebar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sidebar-header",children:"Admin"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"sidebar-nav",children:navItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:item.path,className:_ref=>{let{isActive}=_ref;return isActive?'nav-link active':'nav-link';},end:item.path==='/',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:item.label})},item.path))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sidebar-footer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"small-btn",onClick:()=>{localStorage.removeItem('admin_token');window.dispatchEvent(new Event('app:logout'));navigate('/login');},children:"Logout"})})]});}export default Sidebar;
